allow:
Bash(FILTER_BRANCH_SQUELCH_WARNING=1 git filter-branch --env-filter '
if [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_NAME"" = ""Alexis"" ] || [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_NAME"" = ""Alexis Stefanopoulos"" ] || [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_NAME"" = ""Alexios Stefanopoulos"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_NAME=""AizenvoltPrime""
    export GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL=""$GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL""
fi
if [ ""$GIT_COMMITTER_NAME"" = ""Alexis"" ] || [ ""$GIT_COMMITTER_NAME"" = ""Alexis Stefanopoulos"" ] || [ ""$GIT_COMMITTER_NAME"" = ""Alexios Stefanopoulos"" ]; then
    export GIT_COMMITTER_NAME=""AizenvoltPrime""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL=""$GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL""
fi
' --tag-name-filter cat -- --branches --tags)
